item.title: Azure Community Conference - 2020
item.description: Azure Community Conference is a 3 day multi-track virtual event scheduled to go live on November 24th 2020. This event is being organized by the Bangalore Azure User Group. The target audience of this virtual event are cloud and web developers working with open source and cloud native technologies on the Microsoft stack. This event will be a free two conference days that includes a free workshop as well. Registration for this event is open.
